replies.body: If nobody gets an exact match, does the prize go to the set of players who were least wrong, or does nobody win?
the master contest rules did specify that the "Entrant(s) who most closely fulfill the "How to Win" criteria. So I guess that's the least wrong people ;D
I predict that it will rain then both teams will lag out and dc
so i saw that we can't enter multiple times. Am i allowed to enter with my smurf with the same email?
Your not suppose to have a smurf

Incorrect. Nowhere is any of Riots Rules, Regulations or Otherwise does it say you can't have multiple accounts. I really wish people would stop crying about it too.
End of story.

Rito, what date do the entries end? To make my predictions not mainly guesswork i wish to know how well the 4 teams who have not played yet play. Especially rich gang as they are completely new to this.
It closes 6pm today, it says it under how do you enter
Riot games OCE channel on you tube has what i think are all the teams playing matches against one another, look there and there should be a match with the rich gang.
The Rich Gang matches havent started yet (i think they are playing tomorrow) and im just asking when the entries will close
I should make 80000 accounts just to win on one of them
40,000 accounts. There are 8! = 40,320 different permutations, assuming that there are sufficient matches for all combinations to be possible.
when does the first OPL split end?
